title: Fast, easy and effective!
text: Very quick shipping and easy payment methods. If there’s ever an issue thr support staff is very fast to help you. I just got an assortment of the samples they’re running and based off what I got will definitely be back for more. The Baicalm and Mood Lift capsules are a must try for those looking for energy, nootropic/neuroprotective, mood boosting and sleep enhancing solutions effects.The MT-55 extract of Kanna and its mote potently extracted form are great mood boosters. Just watch out if your sensitive to stimulants or are on serotonergics because kanna effects your serotonin levels. Overall: 8/10 = 4/5 hence the 4 stars. I would love to give 5 stars but I try to be realistic. I got the baicalm sample, mood lift sample, sleep support sample, kanna mt-55 and “kanna gum” samples and a small jar of the more stimulating, potent version. So far I’ve tried it all but the gum and they all work.The kanna isn’t as stimulating as I thought but definitely brings the mood boost and an almost calming effect.The more potent version, however. Did give noticeable stimulation. This was after dosing mood lift and 15mg of mt55 in the morning so tolerance may have dulled the stimulation. Still worked well as a mood booster. Basicalm and the sleep capsules did their job amazingly.Can’t wait to try some gum at work today. Cheers!

title: Very good experience, except
text: Very good experience, except for timeliness of shipment.

title: Great products, just don't expect a response if you email them with a question
text: Great, quality products. Customer service is apparently lacking though. I've emailed them twice to ask about a product I've been ordering no longer being on their website. Still haven't gotten a response if it's been discontinued or what the deal is.  It's now 20 days later and wrote them twice hoping for a response. :( At least the products are good as is their shipping promptly.

title: Ordering is fast and easy
text: Ordering is fast and easy, only problem is the post office. I don't know why they run it all the way to Indianapolis when there's a hub in Gary. I'm in Michigan City. Adds an unnecessary day to shipping. I paid extra for priority mail for nothing. Took the same amount of time as first class.

title: Quality on par with the very best

title: Order arrived s as expected…
text: Had no idea if the order was shipped out, when it might be expected, or how to track it. The last email said the order was complete, a day after the order was made. However, it later arrived in a normal timeframe, fulfilled as expected.

title: Still a great experience ordering from…
text: Still a great experience ordering from Liftmode in general. Great quality products, nice selection, and my items shipped even faster than what I'm used to. I was surprised when I got my order a few days early. It's enjoyable navigating through the site and I also really like the new products Liftmode keeps releasing. The only issue preventing a 5 star is that there is still a problem with inventory for some things. They will unfortunately be out of stock on some items and if you're unlucky, you'll have to wait for a while before they restock.

title: The Good and the not so Good
text: Shipping was very fast (2nd day air). I did have to purchase twice as much as I normally do to get that free shipping. Considering that the price has gone up by about 20% in less than 2 years (more than inflation) it would be nice if the threshold for free shipping, even if it takes 4-5 days, would make buying this very good product more affordable.

title: The prices for small products are a bit…

title: Quality Vendor
text: LiftMode seems to have made it a mission to differentiate what they do from other vendors of herbal (and non-herbal) "remedies". I think they are successful. Their website and order process is efficient and professional-looking. The packaging is first-rate and includes surprisingly extensive documentation of purity and suggested use of the items sold. In this they exceed expectations.The only reason this is four rather than five stars is price on some things is not the lowest out there. Clearly, I haven't compared price on all the products LiftMode offers with those of other vendors; just on the items I bought. I will return to LiftMode. I don't mind paying a little more if I am reassured that what I am receiving is high quality and the company cares about the product.

title: I'm pleased with everything but price is too high.
text: I've ordered from LiftMode several times and have had a good experience.  The product description on the website is accurate and the ordering process is easy.  I've also appreciated the quicker shipping options and my products arrived on time.  My only complaint is the price for the product I order.  It's made in China and the majority of research that I've found indicates that the cost of it is pennies on the dollar.  I realize LiftMode needs to charge a fair price to cover their costs and to be able to offer it to US customers and to make a profit.  However, I feel their profit margin is way too high.  The reality is I've found something that really helps me but can't afford to order it as often as I need to.  I think this is due to a monopoly in that LiftMode is one of very few companies that offer my product so they can charge a higher price.

title: I've been ordering Phenibut from…
text: I've been ordering Phenibut from Liftmode for 4 years. Its always been good quality, and their shipping is super fast which is a plus. I've ordered other products. Here is my review of each.Magnolia Extract: It was good for sleep, but not perfect. It's good if you have little insomnia here and there, but not for serious insomnia. But good when combined with other sleep supplements like Valerian Root. Phenethylamine: Great stimulant, but very short-acting (1 to 2 hours) I would suggest combining it with Hordenine to increase the duration which I found works nicely. Be aware though the crash aka after the effects wear out is not comfortable so use these compounds sparingly. Sleep Caps: Didn't work that good for me, but it works really well for my brother, so worth a try if you suffer from insomnia. Energy Caps: Had a good wakefulness effect, but only when you take at least 3 caps at a time, so bear that in mind if thinking about buying these.Overall I love Liftmode, and their prices, and wouldn't buy anywhere else.

title: Been buying phenibut by the 500 gram…
text: Been buying phenibut by the 500 gram tub from liftmode for years. Great quality, great price. Win win because liftmode was still making a killing off me, but now with phenibut prices at all time lows do to increased global use, especially through liftmode alone, they've made the unwise decision to sell 250 grams max. This costs more, and it's a d*ck thing to do to loyal/hooked customers, even if it's an attempt to stay off DEA scheduling radar, which I suspect it is.Having people show up at the ER from withdrawel is far worse than openly selling half kilos of a Russian pharm on the clearnet. As a Gaba B agonist, it's withdrawel symptoms and risk are on par with others - GHB, Alcohol, barbiturates...this means they're very bad. Agonizing nentally and physically. Tremors delusion, siezures, extreme anxiety, insomnia (extended inability to sleep compounding all of the above), and no ER will accept you for detox if you show up saying your kicking phen. They've either not heard of it or their system is too full with opiate addicts....but they do keep a log and report to the government and this would be the evidence the DEA holds up to get the Banhammer out.The DEA and FDA a despise substances that people use to self medicate, especially sucMy point is this - you're screwing your customers and yourselves by making a product you laid out unaffordable for some. I would bet 70% if not way more of your profit comes from phenibut. Stop price gauging now that you cornered the market. Buy out Newmind or something and spread your sales out or. Don't telling your customers it's a stocking issue when your competition is selling at the best prices they've ever listed, because some of us see what's going on and will buy from them just to screw you back (look up my sales record as an example). I'm fortunate enough to have a doctor that will write a baflofen prescription having never heard of it, but most are not. Some are finding themselves in situations where it's lose your job or go to the ER and try to explain what phenibut is and why they've been consuming it by the gram not the MG...Still the best in the supplement game. Don't F it up. Good that you want to hear from your customers but I've already emailed about this and got no reply.

title: Happy, longtime Lift-Mode Customer with Suggestions for Improvement!
text: I've been a LiftMode customer for years now and am routinely impressed with the operation's turn-around speed following from the time of your order online, to the products' shipment out from their facilities. In addition, they offer free guaranteed two-day or even one-day delivery service if the price of your purchase is high enough.The quality of their products is generally pretty high. That said, every once in a while, I might receive an order that doesn't quite seem to be at the caliber of the others I routinely purchase, but it's more than acceptable. And I'm sure I could reach out to LiftMode and say something, but the difference in quality is so minute that it's not even close to worth it.A recent trend that I've found a bit disappointing is slowly increasing costs on some of their products. The price of 1000 mg worth of Phenibut fluctuates on the site (I assume this depends on stock availability), but recently those fluctuations have tended to push prices higher and higher. What I might have paid for around $160 or so a few months ago can now cost $220 or more. I've also noticed that the range of products available fluctuates from time to time. For example, I prefer to purchase Phenibut that's in a large or medium crystal grain size, but lately, only the fine crystal or powder versions are in stock. The mobile site could also use some work, as the menu options at the top no longer appear with labels. I know from the past to press the orange buttons at the top to pull down options to select but always have to press a few of them before locating the link that I need. Or, when using the search feature for products (for instance, entering the term "Phenibut" to search), not all quantities of Phenibut appear in the search, making it seem as though the larger bottles are not for sale. The only way to locate the larger quantities is to go into my previous orders and click "reorder" -- which puts whatever larger size bottle that might be in stock into my cart.  They do offer discounts for longtime customers, but I wish these were more substantial, especially as the prices have trended upward. All that said, I'm a happy LiftMode customer and would recommend their products to all. They provide a needed service that is trustworthy too, and I thank them for that!

title: Good stuff. Improves the quality of my sleep
text: I don't think Phenibut effects me very much while awake. When I take a high dose I notice almost no difference while I'm awake. I was hoping for a more euphoric effect but substances effect everyone differently. I have been prescribed Gabapentin in the past with similar effects while awake. However If I take 300-600mg of Phenibut before bed I have a slight increase in dreams and I wake up feeling amazingly refreshed. I did not have that effect with Gabapentin. Phenibut is great stuff for sleep. It doesn't help me fall asleep but it definitely improves the quality of my sleep which is something I need. Melatonin and a Phenibut capsule or 2 before bed is an amazing combination for me. Will buy again soon. Some idiot below said it was tainted with MDMA. Not at all. That guy had a false positive and is dumb.

title: Received my order of phenibut HCL…
text: Received my order of phenibut HCL promptly...with free capsule samples. Took a conservative 600 mg on day one and was unsure if I " felt" anything. On day two, I took 1 gram and began to feel the effects...including increased focus, extra energy, and some euphoria. On day 3, took 600 mg and felt a bit sluggish with a minor headache. During these three days, I lost interest in food and even forgot one meal completely. I was thristy and drank quite a bit of water. Sleep was different...hard to go to sleep and hard to get up. Am taking a break. Likely will only take 600 mg once or twice a week...but not consecutive days.

title: Liftmode noopept
text: I purchased several items from Liftmode. This review is for Noopept. I purchased this because it claimed to increase mental clarity. I have MS & Fibro both disorders are characterized as causing terrible brain fog. I ask my doctor & he actually encouraged me to try it a couple time a week. My 1st time trying noopept I took 7mg. My son who is 9 had the flu so I had been up most of the night with him due to his high fever & nausea. Having had hardly any sleep 6am came too quickly. I slipped out of bed to get dressed feeling aweful. Due to lack of sleep I was having a terrible case of brain fog so I thought why not try the noopept. After about 20 minutes I could feel a little surge or energy (motivation actually). I did experience more of a focus while at work. That afternoon I followed up with another small dose of 5mg. It helped me to get through the rest of my evening routine of cooking, cleaning, & taking care of my kids. That night I went to bed at 9pm & slept fine. I tried noopept again the next after having properly rested. It did workuch better. I followed my doctors advise & only took Noopept 3 times that week. I won't be taking it daily but I like having it with my other supplements just incase I  having another bout of brain fog & I need the clarity that noopept did successfully provide with.ThanksHappy Girl :)

title: These supplements are very effective
text: I find Liftmode to be an excellent source for concentrated supplements of the mood- enhancing and anti-anxiety variety. It is the best place for someone to go... if they know what they want. But a customer should know, for instance, that if they take, say, six spoonfuls of Phenibut every day for two weeks and then stop, they very well might experience a mini psychotic episode. This could easily confuse a person into thinking they've gone crazy. So, I think some sort of very clear acknowledgement by Liftmode, of the many effects of these supplements will go a long way toward the integrity and service of the company. A little hand-holding, sensitively written, will help a user understand the complexities of some supplements, and that the products will not hurt them. That said, I believe the supplememnts benefit and can, ljterally, safe lives. Thank you.

title: Phenibut seems to work
text: I've tried a lot of different herbal treatments and amino acids for anxiety and insomnia.  Phenibut does seem to work.   For me, it works better as a sleep aid.  I often wake up in the early morning hours-- 2:00, 4:00, etc..  What works best is taking 500 mg of the Phenibut in the late afternoon and then another 250mg right before bed.  While I don't sleep completely through the night, it's definitely a more restful sleep with only one wake up.  I wish I could take it every night, but understand the tolerance issues.  LiftMode delivery is super fast, and I will buy again.
